channel.title: .Net on 张华的博客
channel.description: Recent content in .Net on 张华的博客

item.title: 2021 04 09 How to Enable TLS1
item.description: How to enable TLS 1.2 on clients 12/13/2019 There are three tasks for enabling TLS 1.2 on clients: Update Windows and WinHTTP Ensure that TLS 1.2 is enabled as a protocol for SChannel at the operating system level Update and configure the .NET Framework to support TLS 1.2 Ref: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/configmgr/core/plan-design/security/enable-tls-1-2-client Verify the value of the DefaultSecureProtocols registry setting, for example: 1 2 3 4 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Internet Settings\WinHttp\ DefaultSecureProtocols = (DWORD): 0xAA0
